lyrics:
Fearless people
Careless needle
Harsh words are spoken
With lives that are broken
Forceful aging
Help me, I'm fading
Heaven is waiting
Time to move on
Crossing that bridge
With lessons I've learned
Playing with fire
And not getting burned
I may not know
What you're going through
But time is a space
Between me and you
Life carries on
Just say die
And that would be pessimistic
In your mind
We can walk across water
Please don't cry
It's a prayer for the dying
I just don't know
What's got into me
We're crossing that bridge
With lessons I've learned
Playing with fire
And not getting burned
I may not know
What you're going through
But time is a space
Between me and you
There is a light
Through that window
Hold on, say yes
Life carries on
Carries on
Life carries on
Carries on
We're crossing that bridge
With lessons I've learned
We're playing with fire
And not getting burned
I may not know
What you're going through
But time is a space
Between me and you
There is a light
Through that window
Hold on, say yes
While others say no
'Cause life carries on
Carries on
With a prayer for the dying
For the dying
